text: Adriano Celentano (; born 6 January 1938) is an Italian singer-songwriter, musician, actor and movie director. He is known as "il Molleggiato". He was born in Milan. In 1962, Celentano founded the Italian record label Clan Celentano. His best known works are "24.000 Baci", "Il Tuo Bacio e’ Come un Rock" and "Si e’ Spento il Sole". ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Italian singer-songwriters Category:21st- century Italian singers Category:21st-century Italian songwriters Category:Italian musicians Category:Italian movie directors Category:Actors from Milan Category:Sanremo Music Festival winners
title: Adriano Celentano
